level.heading: SANCTIONS IN THE POWER PROGRAM (ยง 29-5830)

level.text: Each POWER recipient who, without good cause, fails to assist in the development of his or her plan of self-sufficiency or to comply with the terms contained in that plan shall be subject to sanctions by DHS, as set forth in subsections 5812.2 and 5812.3.
